column1: {% for story in stories %}"{{ story.title | strip | xml_escape }}"
column4: {% if story.lead_image.en-US.url %}{{ story.lead_image.en-US.url | strip | prepend: "https:" }}{% else %}https://unsplash.com/photos/8oB43mw658c/download?ixid=MnwxMjA3fDB8MXxzZWFyY2h8MTZ8fHdvbWVufGVufDB8fHx8MTY1MDI2ODYzOQ{% endif %}
column6: {% if story.words_by.en-US %}{% for a in story.words_by.en-US %}{{ a.name.en-US | append: ";" }}{% endfor %}{% endif %}
column7: {% if story.alt_date %}{{ story.alt_date }}{% else %}{{ story.sys.created_at }}{% endif %}
column8: {% if story.topic.en-US %}{% for t in story.topic.en-US %}{{ t.title.en-US | append: ";" }}{% endfor %}{% endif %}
